name: Pincushion Protea hand embroidered hoop art - 4 inch
description:
I've hand embroidered this pincushion protea in silver gray embroidery floss on punch-colored, 100% linen. Wood hoop is 4" with an moss green grosgrain ribbon around the perimeter.

Copyrighted 'pincushion' design used with the permission of Heather Moore of skinnylaminx.

name: Trees in Bloom, Wasp & Butterfly hand embroidered hoop art
description:
Trees in Bloom. Pure wool felt leaves on two trees hand-embroidered on Irish linen in a 8" wooden hoop. Based on a Scandinavian design.

Wasp. Hand embroidered on Irish linen and held in three 4 inch wooden hoops, these wasps are based on an 1878 illustration. Wings are pure wool felt. Choose from the following color combinations: aqua & green, purple & orange, magenta & citrine, red & orange

Butterfly. Magenta or orange butterfly on citrine, green, aqua, red or purple pure wool felt in a 3" wooden hoop with a grosgrain ribbon around the perimeter.

For additional photos, please send me your email.

name: iPhone Case in pure wool felt
description:
Protect your iPhone 4 in this pure wool felt, bi-color case. Designed for a secure fit as well as easy access so you don't miss any important calls! Pictured in green and charcoal.

Men's Line (front & back) with gray label

sky blue & green
sky blue & charcoal
green & Yale blue
green & charcoal
Yale blue & green
Yale blue & charcoal

magenta / sky blue
magenta / orange
green / magenta
Yale blue / green
Yale blue / orange
red / orange
sky blue / magenta
sky blue / orange
sky blue / red

Please indicate color selections (front & back) when placing order.


* spot clean

name: Hand Embroiderd Hoop Art - Citrine Tree, L O V E and Ginkgo Leaves
description:
Three pieces of hoop art in wooden hoops.

- The  tree has over 800 hand-embroidered stitches on Irish linen and is in 6" hoop.   Shown in citrine, it is also available in 

aqua
orange
magenta
spring green
purple

- Hand embroidered L O V E in 4" hoop. Magenta, aqua, citrine & orange.  Based on the sculpture designed by Robert Indiana which was first placed in the JFK Plaza in Philadelphia in 1976 as part of the United States' Bicentennial celebration.

- Hand embroidered ginkgo leaves in 3" hoop. Shown in aqua and also available in green, grape, orange or charcoal gray.

For additional photos, please send me your email.
